title: [flang][docs][OpenMP] array sections with DEPEND are supported
commits:
[flang][docs][OpenMP] array sections with DEPEND are supported

This was added in
- https://github.com/llvm/llvm-project/pull/132230
- https://github.com/llvm/llvm-project/pull/132994
- https://github.com/llvm/llvm-project/pull/133892
